title: I Have to Pay money to get to know my date ?
body: i made a similar thread few days ago , and a moderator replayed that i can know my date by submiting my email and the champions that i own so i made a ticket and they told me to go to this link https://privacy.riotgames.com which obivously says that i have to pay 5$ to know my personal account date ? is this for real {{champion:32}}

replies.body: I don't believe that the privacy page would provide the date of your account creation.  Generally, that's an account recovery question in case of unauthorized access so it's not something that would be given out.  The privacy page you linked does provide private information, so I believe the fee exists for legal legwork. Hope that helps and the reason behind it not sharing account creation info!
